original_text: But the field, when it is released in the jubilee, shall be a holy gift to the Lord, like a field that has been devoted. The priest shall be in possession of it.
korean_text: 희년이 되어서 그 밭이 돌아오게 될 때에는 여호와께 바친 성물이 되어 영영히 드린 땅과 같이 제사장의 기업이 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: when it is released in the jubilee,
shall be a holy gift to the Lord,
like a field that has been devoted.
The priest shall be in possession of it.
